features.name: Express Server Bootstrapping
features.description: Initializes the Express app, JSON/urlencoded parsers, request logging, registers routes, sets global error handler, and starts HTTP server in production.

features.name: API Routes & Middleware
features.description: Defines REST endpoints under /api (health, auth, transactions, tournaments, debug) and attaches middleware for logging and error handling.

features.name: Authentication (Register/Login/Logout)
features.description: Provides user registration and login using bcryptjs for hashing. Handles session/token issuance and logout. Supports Replit auth helper.

features.name: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
features.description: Implements role/permission checks for protected operations (e.g., admin vs. coach vs. player).

features.name: Storage Abstraction
features.description: Abstracts persistence layer behind a storage interface with implementations for Firestore; used by API routes to read/write domain data.

features.name: Database & ORM (Drizzle)
features.description: Drizzle ORM configuration for SQL-based persistence (optional/experimental alongside Firestore).

features.name: OAuth Configuration
features.description: Centralized OAuth provider settings (e.g., Google, others) for sign-in flows.

features.name: Analytics Fetcher
features.description: Fetches social or platform analytics to support dashboards and insights.

features.name: Shared Domain Schema
features.description: Defines TypeScript types and models shared between client and server (e.g., Tournament, Transaction, User, Club).

features.name: Frontend Application
features.description: Vite-based frontend with Tailwind styling. Pages/components for auth, dashboard, tournaments, transactions, and club management.

features.name: Serverless Adapter (Vercel)
features.description: Bridges the Express app into Vercel serverless via a catch-all function entry (imports compiled dist/routes.js).

features.name: Netlify Functions (Alternative)
features.description: Scaffolding for Netlify functions as an alternative deployment target.

features.name: Firebase Hosting & Security Rules
features.description: Firebase hosting config and Firestore security rules, indexes for structured access and performance.

features.name: Data Import & Migration
features.description: Scripts and JSON datasets to import or migrate existing data into the system.

features.name: Build & Dev Config
features.description: Project configuration files for TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind, and package management.
